Detailed Description

template<typename Tnu, typename Tx, typename Tp>
struct emsr::cyl_mod_bessel_t< Tnu, Tx, Tp >

This struct captures the state of the modified cylindrical Bessel functions at a given order and argument.

Definition at line 509 of file specfun_state.h.
